name: Fighting (itch)
description:
This is a first-person role-playing storytelling game. The background of the game is the outbreak of covid-19 in Wuhan, China in 2020. In this sudden and rapidly spreading epidemic, the whole world is united to fight the epidemic. Players will constantly switching between two roles with different identities.

Make your own choices, and experience the most intuitive presentation of family affection and love in life under this epidemic, as well as the common fight against the epidemic.

In this game, players can interact and dialogue with scenes, objects, and characters. Complete different chapters to promote the development of the game.
